name: Spotify Tool
semantic_context: Access public song data via the Spotify API
natural_language_description: 这是 Spotify Tool 节点。主要用于: Access public song data via the Spotify API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Access public song data via the Spotify API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Access public song data via the Spotify API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: player

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getFollowingArtists
available_options: Get Following Artists (值: getFollowingArtists) - Get your followed artists

id.name: id
id.description: The track's Spotify URI or ID
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Track ID | 作用: The track's Spotify URI or ID | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: The keyword term to search for
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Keyword | 作用: The keyword term to search for | (必填项)

country.name: country
country.description: Top tracks in which country? Enter the postal abbreviation
country.natural_language_description: 参数名: Country | 作用: Top tracks in which country? Enter the postal abbreviation | 默认值: US | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the playlist to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the playlist to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: position (值: None) - The new track's position in the playlist

trackID.name: trackID
trackID.description: The track's Spotify URI or its ID. The track to add/delete from the playlist.
trackID.natural_language_description: 参数名: Track ID | 作用: The track's Spotify URI or its ID. The track to add/delete from the playlist. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50 | (必填项)

volumePercent.name: volumePercent
volumePercent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Volume | 作用: The volume percentage to set | 默认值: 50 | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: market (值: None) - If a country code is specified, only content that is playable in that market is returned
